knimeNode.name: R Model Writer
knimeNode.shortDescription: Writes an R model to a (zip) file.

fullDescription.intro: Writes an R model in a KNIME proprietary format to a zip file. This model can later be read using the appropriate reader.
fullDescription.option: Select the location of the output file.
If unchecked, the node refuses to execute when the output file exists (prevent unintentional overwrite).
